attributes.action: Scrap all funding for the Kyoto Protocol and use the funds to eradicate malaria in Africa
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hundreds of millions of pounds have been spent on the pointless Kyoto Protocol with the supposed intention of saving lives. The Kyoto Protocol has not had any effect, except for lining the pockets of the terminally greedy. If this money were to be spent on solving the malaria problem in Africa thousands of lives would be saved for a fraction of the cost.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
